definition[0]: to make something continue for longer than is necessary
example[0]: I’m paid by the hour, so I spin the work out as long as I can.
definition[1]: to use money, food etc as carefully and slowly as possible, because you do not have very much of it
example[1]: I’ve only got £10 left, so we’ll have to spin it out over the whole week.
definition[2]: if a car spins out, the driver loses control of it and the car spins around
